etymologies: late Middle English (earlier as tarmaret): perhaps from French terre mérite and modern Latin terra merita, literally ‘deserving earth’, or perhaps an alteration of an oriental word

definitions: a bright yellow aromatic powder obtained from the rhizome of a plant of the ginger family, used for flavoring and coloring in Asian cooking and formerly as a fabric dye.
shortDefinitions: bright yellow aromatic powder obtained from rhizome of plant of ginger family, used for flavouring and colouring in Asian cooking and formerly as fabric dye

definitions: the Asian plant from which turmeric is obtained.
shortDefinitions: Asian plant from which turmeric is obtained
